name: inoreader - countrystyle ( flat ui + remove ADs )
description:
A customized style for InoReader with :
1. Comfortable fonts, font size, line height and background color, with extended width article detail view.
2. Flat UI style.
3. Remove ADs.
PS: This style is suitable for the official theme “Light Theme” with“Extended View” / “Column View”.
additional_info:
为了提高阅读效率，根据个人阅读风格，喜欢大字号、土土的背景、扩展内容宽度、隐藏广告

请在官方 “Light Theme”、“Extended View” / “Column View” 模式下使用
